alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 24 at 3:27AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of Colorado and Kansas, including the following counties, in Colorado, Cheyenne, Kit Carson and Yuma. In Kansas, Sherman and Wallace. * WHEN...From this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rainfall over one inch is expected along with high rainfall rates in individual storms that could lead to areas of flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
